Text.Page:
The stonebeaks are menacing trade routes, and if we don't teach them a lesson, their attacks will grow bolder.

Hunt {@LinkCreature:3#1001#stonebeak fighters} and {@LinkCreature:3#101#stonebeak soldiers}.

Show their spears to Rhona in Bulwark Camp when you're done. She's paying a bounty for them.
Good work, soldier. Here's your reward.
Get back out there, <PCCLASS:lcase>. We don't want stonebeaks getting unruly, do we?
